news.title: Trump says U.S. oil companies will invest billions of dollars in Venezuela after Maduro’s overthrow
news.description: U.S. oil companies will invest billions of dollars in Venezuela's energy sector after the overthrow of Nicolas Maduro, President Donald Trump said.

news.title: Trump's removal of Maduro prompts questions from Congress
news.description: Congressional lawmakers say they were not briefed before President Donald Trump launched a land attack on Venezuela and deposed President Nicolas Maduro.

news.title: After a bruising 2025, the Fed faces another slew of challenges in the year ahead
news.description: The central bank heads into 2026 facing a slew of political and policy challenges.

news.title: U.S. indictment against Venezuela President Maduro, wife is unsealed
news.description: The indictment was unsealed hours after U.S. forces launched an attack on Venezuela and captured its president Nicolas Maduro and his wife, Cilia Flores.

news.title: Airlines cancel hundreds of Caribbean flights after U.S. attacks on Venezuela
news.description: U.S. airlines cancel hundreds of Caribbean flights after U.S. strikes on Venezuela.

news.title: Bank of America expects a boost in dividends in 2026. These stocks have payouts that beat the market
news.description: Bank of America's Savita Subramanian expects stocks’ dividend growth will rise year over year in 2026.

news.title: Watch Trump's full comments following the U.S. strike against Venezuela
news.description: President Donald Trump is scheduled to speak Saturday morning following a stunning, large-scale attack on Venezuela overnight.

news.title: Trump orders Chinese-controlled firm to unwind chip asset deal, citing national security risks
news.description: A Chinese-controlled company must divest semiconductor assets it bought from Emcore after the White House said the deal could threaten U.S. national security.

news.title: China’s ‘Silicon Valley’ is building robots and fortune-telling AI apps at the same time
news.description: Hangzhou’s AI ecosystem now spans everything from cutting-edge robotics to experimental apps built by solo founders.

news.title: These are the most overbought and oversold stocks in the S&P 500 as 2026 begins
news.description: The year just began, but there may be opportunities for investors to catch potential bounces on some stocks — or avoid pullbacks near-term.

news.title: Trump: We are going to run Venezuela until we can do a safe, proper and judicious transition
news.description: President Donald Trump addressed the attack on Venezuela from his Mar-a-Lago residence in Palm Beach, Florida.

news.title: Economist Mark Zandi sees the Fed surprising with three rate cuts in first half of 2026
news.description: Markets and Fed officials themselves see only modest easing in the year ahead.

news.title: Gas prices fall to four-year lows as millions embark on holiday road trips
news.description: The average price of unleaded gasoline in the U.S. is at its lowest since 2021, according to AAA.

news.title: Trust these numbers? Economists see a lot of flaws in delayed CPI report showing downward inflation
news.description: Thursday saw the release of a much lighter-than-expected inflation report for November, and economists are already questioning its significance.

news.title: November consumer prices rose at a 2.7% annual rate, lower than expected, delayed data shows
news.description: Economists polled by Dow Jones expected CPI to have risen 3.1% on an annualized basis.

news.title: Bank of England cuts interest rates, in welcome Christmas boost for consumers
news.description: The Bank of England voted to cut interest rates from 4% to 3.75% in its last monetary policy move of 2025.

news.title: November's inflation report is the first to be released after the shutdown. Here's what to expect
news.description: November's CPI report is expected to show the annual inflation rate at 3.1%, according to economists polled by Dow Jones.

news.title: Week in review: We initiated a position — plus, top gainers and laggards of 2025
news.description: Friday marked the end of a lackluster week for stocks and the first trading session of the new year.

news.title: Anthropic's 'do more with less' bet has kept it at the AI frontier, co-founder Amodei tells CNBC
news.description: Daniela Amodei and her brother, Dario Amodei, who is Anthropic's CEO, helped build the very worldview they're now betting against.

news.title: Ilya Lichtenstein, Bitcoin hacker behind massive crypto theft, credits Trump for early prison release
news.description: Ilya Lichtenstein had been sentenced to five years in prison after pleading guilty and admitting to the hack of crypto assets valued in the billions of dollars.

news.title: Chip stocks rally to start 2026 after third-straight winning year
news.description: Investors piled into the winning artificial intelligence-adjacent sector following another big year of gains.

news.title: Musk's xAI faces backlash after Grok generates sexualized images of children on X
news.description: Users on X raised concerns over explicit content of minors being generated using Musk's Grok tool.

news.title: Tesla reports 418,227 deliveries for the fourth quarter, down 16%
news.description: Tesla's fourth-quarter deliveries report follows a steep rally in the company's stock in the last few months of 2025.

news.title: 'A dangerous ​precedent': World leaders react to the U.S. attack on Venezuela
news.description: Russia and Iran broadly condemned the U.S. attack on Venezuela, while other world leaders called for de-escalation and said they are monitoring the situation.

news.title: U.S. attacks Venezuela, captures Maduro and his wife; AG Bondi says charges include 'Narco-Terrorism'
news.description: Maduro and his wife were captured and removed from the country following the operation, Trump said in a statement on Truth Social.
